mapper.sql: dengmi_seq, mimian, mimu, mige, midi, mizhu, zuozhe, jieshi, shangxi, leixing
mapper.insert: insert into dengmi (dengmi_seq, mimian, mimu, mige, midi, mizhu, zuozhe, jieshi, shangxi, leixing) values (#{dengmiSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mimian,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mimu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mige,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zuozhe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jieshi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shangxi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{leixing,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into dengmi
dengmi_seq,
mimian,
mimu,
mige,
midi,
mizhu,
zuozhe,
jieshi,
shangxi,
leixing,

mapper.update:
update dengmi
mimian = #{mimian,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mimu = #{mimu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mige = #{mige,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
midi = #{midi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mizhu = #{mizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zuozhe = #{zuozhe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
jieshi = #{jieshi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shangxi = #{shangxi,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
leixing = #{leixing,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where dengmi_seq = #{dengmiSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dengmi set mimian = #{mimian,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mimu = #{mimu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mige = #{mige,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, midi = #{midi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mizhu = #{mizhu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zuozhe = #{zuozhe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jieshi = #{jieshi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shangxi = #{shangxi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, leixing = #{leixing,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dengmi_seq = #{dengmiSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT dengmi_seq FROM hallth.dengmi order by dengmi_seq desc limit 1

select
from dengmi
mimian like '%' #{mimian, jdbcType=VARCHAR} '%'
mimu like '%' #{mimu, jdbcType=VARCHAR} '%'
midi like '%' #{midi, jdbcType=VARCHAR} '%'
order by dengmi_seq desc
